channel.title: Realism - 614 server source + client // Compiler's added!
channel.description:
THIS IS A PICKUP PVP 614 SERVER!! Realism 614
Features:
100% curses Pickup PvP // Spawn Pk Full maging, ancients, lunar with working miasmic spell New Runescape Emotes New Skill Cape Emotes!! Few 643 stuff Pk Area's Full screen! HD Client!! Full Castle wars!?! All Spirite sheild work Chaotics Edgevill as Home Custom Pk spot Tons of spawn commands Auto-Cast 100% All GodSwords work 100% including Specials Perfect pking Perfect Hybriding Perfect Community Sounds/Music ingame!!!!!??!?!?!? Handcannon Npc Vs Npc Dungoneering 20% [b]Players do Not reset after logging out!![/b]
24/7 running on vps!!
AND SO MUCH MORE.....
Pictures:
[IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h407/cliip-kits/triob.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h407/cliip-kits/pnpcrangemageatkingmele.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h407/cliip-kits/picresized_th_1313720010_zerk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h407/cliip-kits/pvpy.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h407/cliip-kits/picresized_th_1313719827_turm.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h407/cliip-kits/picresized_th_1313719774_solspec.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h407/cliip-kits/picresized_th_1313719718_magicemote.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h407/cliip-kits/picresized_th_1313719568_dung.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h407/cliip-kits/picresized_th_1313719505_curses1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h407/cliip-kits/picresized_th_1313719446_attackemote.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h407/cliip-kits/handgonne.jpg[/img]
[b]Credits:[/b]
RuneExtream 614 (85%) Me (10%) Kelvin AR (5%)
Credits to google & Moparscape for the Tuts out there :) Maybe Legecy 614? Ripped alot from that too.
Edit: Old Source had alot of bug's, Tons of spawn commands e.g. ::dharok ::ahrim ::ags, No more commands at duel arena. Edgvil home, Fixed wilderness , and more!
[b]Download Links: [/b]
Client : http://www.mediafire.com/?71v5wo3rqsc42pv (connect to my current vps which is hosting atm & files inside are hidden just unhide :P ) Source: http://uppit.com/rybz3kttv7l0/614_source_v8.rar (changed link so to uppit to keep track of downloads :))
Please Don't be harsh saying it's leech or what ever :( I'm still novice and did try my best :S
Need help? got the money? add my msn: iam@clip-kits.com // i will not help anseer questions for free (sorry im.sad :-()
Edit: To run the server look in your client folder for cache614, Copy that and paste the whole folder in to your Cdrive. Do not Cut it!
Edit:
[size=18pt]Source Compiler ! [/size]
[code=abap]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/netty-3.1.5.GA.jar -sourcepath src src/RuneExtream/*.java pause[/code]

item.dc:creator: @meher meher
item.description:
@meher wrote:

[quote=“hulkman68, post:132, topic:411477”][quote author=meher link=topic=512733.msg4112469#msg4112469 date=1348662350]
Hey uhm…I have a problem.
Other people cannot connect to my server.
I have portforwarded & did all the stuff I’m supposed to. It works with a 317 server, they can connect to it. But when using this 614 it won’t work…Any help please??
[/quote] Make sure the Client is connecting to Port 43594( Or whatever you’ve portforwarded ) and that the server is running on that port.[/quote]

And how do I make sure that the client & source are running on the port? What files…? And for the client ip I literally changed EVERYTHING that had 127.0.0.1 to my ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Realism - 614 server source + client // Compiler's added!
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

[quote=“funnyguy99, post:124, topic:411477”][quote author=Smileur link=topic=512733.msg4068477#msg4068477 date=1344127982]
Hello Moparians !

I’ve seen few of us is having some difficulties to log in client ! Actually, it only takes 2 minutes and everything is fine for me !

First, if you didn’t, you have to copy/paste the folder “614cache” into your C:.

Second, you must have set that you can see hidden files. I wouldnt see it if I didnt turned it on.

Then, you open on the file “launcher.java”, then you DELETE IT. What do I mean ? Is to have a copy even if the file is deleted.

Now what you got it, look for this :

you will see 2 URLs : One with “http://world16.runescape.com” and another one with an ip… To only load on your localhost, change the ip in the second URL for 127.0.0.1 .

Then, it’s time to compile. You’re lucky, IcyPhat put it into the topic ! Just open a notepad file and paste his code below :

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp clientlibs.jar -sourcepath . *.java pause

NOTE : JDK 1.6.0_25 is MY JDK, you have to change version if you don’t have. It currently works for jdk1.7+.

Save that file into the client folder with the name “compile.bat”, then open that file, and when it’s compiled, restart your client and try to log in ! It should work now.

Hope it helps !

~Smileur.
[/quote]doesnt work
when i click my compile.bat i get this

Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
Press any key to continue. . .

And also, I am running on windows 7.[/quote]

Lmfao. There’s nothing wrong with notes. That means it has compiled correctly…

Read full topic
item.source: Realism - 614 server source + client // Compiler's added!

[quote=“Smileur, post:123, topic:411477”]Hello Moparians !

I’ve seen few of us is having some difficulties to log in client ! Actually, it only takes 2 minutes and everything is fine for me !

First, if you didn’t, you have to copy/paste the folder “614cache” into your C:.

Second, you must have set that you can see hidden files. I wouldnt see it if I didnt turned it on.

Then, you open on the file “launcher.java”, then you DELETE IT. What do I mean ? Is to have a copy even if the file is deleted.

Now what you got it, look for this :

you will see 2 URLs : One with “http://world16.runescape.com” and another one with an ip… To only load on your localhost, change the ip in the second URL for 127.0.0.1 .

Then, it’s time to compile. You’re lucky, IcyPhat put it into the topic ! Just open a notepad file and paste his code below :

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp clientlibs.jar -sourcepath . *.java pause

NOTE : JDK 1.6.0_25 is MY JDK, you have to change version if you don’t have. It currently works for jdk1.7+.

Save that file into the client folder with the name “compile.bat”, then open that file, and when it’s compiled, restart your client and try to log in ! It should work now.

Hope it helps !

~Smileur.[/quote]doesnt work
when i click my compile.bat i get this

Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
Press any key to continue. . .

And also, I am running on windows 7.

item.title: Realism - 614 server source + client // Compiler's added!
item.dc:creator: @Smileur Smileur
item.description:
@Smileur wrote:

Hello Moparians !

I’ve seen few of us is having some difficulties to log in client ! Actually, it only takes 2 minutes and everything is fine for me !

First, if you didn’t, you have to copy/paste the folder “614cache” into your C:.

Second, you must have set that you can see hidden files. I wouldnt see it if I didnt turned it on.

Then, you open on the file “launcher.java”, then you DELETE IT. What do I mean ? Is to have a copy even if the file is deleted.

Now what you got it, look for this :

you will see 2 URLs : One with “http://world16.runescape.com” and another one with an ip… To only load on your localhost, change the ip in the second URL for 127.0.0.1 .

Then, it’s time to compile. You’re lucky, IcyPhat put it into the topic ! Just open a notepad file and paste his code below :

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp clientlibs.jar -sourcepath . *.java pause

NOTE : JDK 1.6.0_25 is MY JDK, you have to change version if you don’t have. It currently works for jdk1.7+.

Save that file into the client folder with the name “compile.bat”, then open that file, and when it’s compiled, restart your client and try to log in ! It should work now.

Hope it helps !

~Smileur.

Read full topic
